backend/main.mo: Main canister actor defining card, user, and history types with storage maps plus logging, ID generation, and history retrieval utilities.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that mirrors the actor’s data structures and returns old state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a history‑UI update feature to its relevant frontend file and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files for quick reference and build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme file defining light and dark mode OKLCH color tokens and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, actor initialization, profile loading timeouts, and tab-based navigation.
frontend/src/components/AddCardDialog.ts: Dialog for adding cards with free-text rarity, autocomplete fields, validation, and submission to addCard mutation.
frontend/src/components/AutocompleteText: Provides a text input with filtered suggestion dropdown and click-outside closing behavior.
frontend/src/components/CardItem.tsx: Renders a card entry with rarity styling, pricing info, and actions like edit, sell/trade, and delete.
frontend/src/components/CraftedCardsModa: Displays a modal listing crafted cards with rarity badges, metadata, and purchase details.
frontend/src/components/EditCardDialog.t: Modal form for editing card details, handling state reset and submission to update a card.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: Catches rendering errors and shows a recovery UI with technical details and reload option.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying attribution and link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with branding and authentication controls using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting the user to enter and save their profile name on first use.
frontend/src/components/SellOrTradeDialo: Dialog for selling a card or recording a trade, including form handling, card creation, and mutation calls.
frontend/src/components/SoldCardsModal.t: Modal displaying sales and trade history using transaction groups with tabbed navigation.
frontend/src/hooks/queryKeys.ts: Centralized factory generating consistent React Query keys scoped by principal.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that initializes and manages the backend actor, refetching dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorQueryState.ts: Hook exposing the query state of actor initialization for UI error and retry handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useGoogleAuth.ts: Empty placeholder file for Google auth hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provider and hook managing Internet Identity authentication, session loading, and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for profiles, cards, history, trades, and related mutations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base/theme definitions and color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/CardsPage.tsx: Displays user cards with extensive filtering, search, and dialog for adding cards.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Shows paginated change history with card name mapping, icons, and relative timestamps.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioPage.tsx: Renders portfolio metrics, derived stats, and modals for sold and crafted card details.
frontend/src/utils/cardSuggestions.ts: Generates unique field-based suggestions from cards and filters them by user input.
frontend/src/utils/formatTimestamp.ts: Formats bigint timestamps into readable or relative time strings.
frontend/src/utils/redactSecrets.ts: Redacts sensitive parameter values from strings and errors for safe logging.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, and containers, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata defining schema versions, existing features, and pending feature requests for the Sorare Portfolio project.
